@description.name: @description
@description.body: Single renderer is a class used to render forms into a mobile page. It displays a label above or next to each form element.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Array} qx.Mobile form widgets which are rendered in one single line.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A collection of error containers used to keep the error messages resulted after form validation. Also useful to clear them when the validation passes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Determines whether the given item can be display in one line or whether a separate line for the text label is needed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} the widget which should be added.
@param.description: the widget which should be added.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Boolean} it indicates whether the widget can be displayed
  in same line as the label.
@return.description:
it indicates whether the widget can be displayed
  in same line as the label.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Wraps the given item with a {@link qx.ui.mobile.container.Scroll scroll} container.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} A form item to render.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} A name for the form item.
@param.description: A name for the form item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a label and its according widget in a row and applies the given layout.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} A form item to render.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} A name for the form item.
@param.description: A name for the form item.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: layout {qx.ui.mobile.layout.Abstract} layout of the rendered row.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a separation line into the form.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds an row group header.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds an row group footer.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a row with the name of a group of elements When you want to group certain form elements, this methods implements the way the header of that group is presented.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: title {String} the title shown in the group header
@param.description: the title shown in the group header

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Shows a single item of this form

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.form.IForm} form item which should be hidden.
@param.description: form item which should be hidden.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Hides a single item of this form

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.form.IForm} form item which should be hidden.
@param.description: form item which should be hidden.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the parent row of the item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
